extendedInfo.description: 2 Player Ripples is a competitive yet relaxing game. Have fun with your mate or friend via beautiful circle chains and gentle music. Very SIMPLE game rule: Two players both have one chance to tap screen in each round. The one who eliminates more balls is the WINNER.# Fixed fc on 1.5# New More games.

reviews.title: Kinda sucks.
reviews.comment: Game would be cool if it had beyter instrucyions and you didnt have to keep pressing the valume button..

reviews.comment: This game is addictive & great for two people to spend time together!

reviews.comment: I love this game so much. It\'s very relaxing, yet there\'s still a strategy to it. It\'s really fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Relax for 2
reviews.comment: This is one of the first games I installed long time ago when I was looking for a simple game for 2 people. It\'s dead simple but competitive. All you need to do is to tap the screen at the right time to start a chain reaction - and compare with the results of your opponent. The whole game last a few minutes and I recommend it to have some fun relaxing time with a friend. Review by Best Apps Market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need instructions!
reviews.comment: Well, music is nice game it pretty cool. BUT there were NO instructions on how to play! My husband figured it out finally after like three days! But once you figure it out its not bad...you get one chance to click on or beside a moving circle and then you have to click at right time to start a chain reaction to get points. We love it now that we know how to play!!! <3
reviews.author: A Google User
